items.name: Lewis & Clark Park
items.description: A beautiful city park with playgrounds, picnic areas, and summer events.

items.name: Yellowstone Gateway Museum
items.description: Regional history museum with exhibits on Yellowstone and Montana.

items.name: Gallatin River
items.description: Popular for fishing, rafting, and scenic views.

items.name: Belgrade Special Events Center
items.description: Venue for concerts, sports, and community events.

items.name: Bozeman Yellowstone International Airport
items.description: Montana's busiest airport, connecting the region to the world.

items.name: Rocky Mountain Rodeo
items.description: Annual rodeo event showcasing local talent and western culture.

items.name: Belgrade Community Library
items.description: Public library offering resources, programs, and events for all ages.

items.name: River Rock Pond
items.description: A scenic pond for walking, birdwatching, and relaxation.
